TEXT.S: = Mepuwal = Gaga mniq Myawriseyn Tayansyang ka alang Mepuwal. 55 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 177 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 93% niqan 165 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 7% niqan 12 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal89%, Amis1%, Bunun1%, Paiwan1%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq1%, ni rahuq na o1%.
